wikipedia_page.main: George Thorpe was a professional footballer, who played for Leeds United, Huddersfield Town and Chester City. He was born in Farnworth, near Bolton.

link_mentions.page: List of Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players

response: * George Thorpe (footballer) (1910–1985), English footballer for Leeds United, Huddersfield Town and Chester City
* George Thorpe (Virginia colonist) (1576–1622), Virginia colonist and Berkeley Hundred co-founder
